Column.name: id_repository
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: name
Column.description: A unique name of the repository

Column.name: created
Column.description: Date+time when created

Column.name: created_by
Column.description: Username that created

Column.name: modified
Column.description: Date+time when last modified

Column.name: modified_by
Column.description: Username that last modified

Table.name: sr_software_item
Table.description: A software item, such as a SF service or a module

Column.name: id_software_item
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: id_repository
Column.description: ID of the repository that this software item belongs to

Column.name: name
Column.description: A unique name of the software item within its repository

Column.name: software_item_type
Column.description: Type of software item: 0=undefined, 1=service, 2=client module, 3=web module

Column.name: status
Column.description: Current status of the software item: 0=undefined, 1=new, 2=staged, 3=active, 4=deprecated, 5=dying, 6=dead

Column.name: id_team
Column.description: The team responsible for this service

Column.name: description
Column.description: A short description of the software item

Column.name: description_url
Column.description: An URL to detailed information on the software item

Column.name: deployment_directory
Column.description: A full directory path where the software item is deployed

Column.name: implementation
Column.description: For SoftwareItemType == Service, this is an optional address (URL) of the implementing service.

Column.name: source_control_path
Column.description: Full source control path for the code of this software item

Column.name: drop_location
Column.description: Full directory path of the drop location of this software item

Column.name: build_name
Column.description: TFS build name of this software item

Column.name: log_application_name
Column.description: The application name of the software item as it appears in logs

Column.name: log_application_version
Column.description: The application log version of the software item as it appears in logs

Column.name: external_id
Column.description: Any external id needed to connect this team to a third party system.

Table.name: sr_file_item
Table.description: A file that belongs to a software item

Column.name: id_file_item
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: id_software_item
Column.description: ID of the software item that owns this file item

Column.name: file_path
Column.description: Full file path

Column.name: version
Column.description: Version of the file

Table.name: sr_measurement
Table.description: A measurement of some of the behaviour and/or use of a software item

Column.name: id_measurement
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: id_software_item
Column.description: ID of the software item that owns this measurement

Column.name: measurement_type
Column.description: Type of measurement: 0=undefined, 1=count of PCS lookups, 2=count of calls to a service function.

Column.name: created
Column.description: Date+time when the measurement was created

Column.name: period
Column.description: The period that this measurement covers. It is an integer value spanning a whole month calculated as follows: period = year*12 + (month-1)

Column.name: detail
Column.description: Additional detail breakup of the measurement, like a sub-part of the software item, for example the name of a service method

Column.name: measurement_value
Column.description: The value of this measurement, like number of times a service was called

Table.name: sr_dependency
Table.description: A software item dependency, records the dependency of one software item on another software item

Column.name: id_dependency
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: id_software_item_from
Column.description: ID of the software item that holds the dependency

Column.name: id_software_item_to
Column.description: ID of the software item that id_software_item_from is dependent on

Column.name: source
Column.description: Source of registration: 0=undefined, 1=agent, 2=manual

Column.name: type
Column.description: Type of dependency: 0=undefined, 1=static analysis, 2=actual usage

Table.name: sr_measurement_bookmark
Table.description: A measurement bookmark. It is used to store location in data where scanning agents last scanned so they can later resume at this point

Column.name: id_measurement_bookmark
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: id_repository
Column.description: ID of the repository that owns this bookmark

Column.name: measurement_type
Column.description: The measurement type of this bookmark (see sr.sr_measurement.measurement_type)

Column.name: last_datetime
Column.description: The last date+time used

Table.name: sr_team
Table.description: A team. Teams do not belong to a repostory, they are global.

Column.name: id_team
Column.description: Unique ID

Column.name: name
Column.description: A unique name of the team

Column.name: active
Column.description: True if we allow new data to use this team, false otherwise.

Column.name: contact
Column.description: Contact information such as a list of emails etc.

Column.name: external_id
Column.description: Any external id needed to connect this team to a third party system.
